name: Tom Yum
description: With its exotic flavors, light acidity, aromatic Thai ingredients and tequila with vegetal notes, this cocktail opens new perspectives and stimulates your taste buds.

ingredients.ingredient: Patr√≥n Silver infused with coriander and Kaffir lime

directions: Place all ingredients in a shaker with ice.
Shake and pour into a whiskey glass rimmed with shrimp salt.
Garnish with coriander and dried chili pepper.
Optional shrimp salt: mix 150g of shrimp powder with 250g of salt.
